reviewText: I wasn't thrilled with the DVD, it seemed hard to follow and I took little of value from it. I should say that I have been spinning, dyeing, knitting, and crocheting for at least 10 years. I wouldn't buy it again for the price.

I have been spinning for many years, and purchased this DVD with the idea that I might add to my knowledge of fleeces and spinning.  The wealth of knowledge in this DVD makes it a "must" for any spinner, no matter how experienced.  MacKenzie takes much of the mystery out of buying fleeces, washing them and preparing them for spinning.  Then she also gives us a primer on spinning the fiber from those fleeces.  I will be watching this DVD many times.  Bravo for a wonderful sheep/fleece/fiber experience!
Very good for people interested in sheep for the fiber.  I learned a lot.
Love love this DVD, she's gives great tips and tricks, she shows diff fleeces, compares them, magnificent DVD! Well worth the price!!
